mkdir taskflow-pro
cd taskflow-pro
code .
touch README.md
git init
git add .
git commit -m "Initial commit"
git remote add origin https://github.com/your-username/taskflow-pro.git
git push -u origin master
git branch -M main
git push -u origin main
git branch -M main
git push -u origin main
git branch -M main

mkdir server
mkdir client
taskflow-pro/
├── client/      // ส่วนของ React (หน้าบ้าน)
└── server/      // ส่วนของ Node.js/Express (หลังบ้าน)
touch server/index.js
touch client/index.html
touch client/index.js
touch client/style.css
touch client/App.js
touch client/App.css
touch client/App.test.js
touch client/setupTests.js
touch client/public/index.html
touch client/public/favicon.ico
touch client/public/logo192.png
touch client/public/logo512.png
touch client/public/manifest.json
touch client/public/robots.txt
touch client/public/.gitkeep
touch server/.gitkeep
touch client/.gitkeep
touch .gitignore
touch server/.gitignore
touch client/.gitignore
touch .gitignore

cd server
npm init -y
npm install express
npm install cors
npm install dotenv
npm install morgan
npm install nodemon
npm install mongoose
npm install bcryptjs
npm install jsonwebtoken
npm install express-validator
npm install multer
npm install sharp
npm install nodemailer
npm install redis
npm install socket.io
npm install pm2
npm install pm2-windows-startup
npm install pm2-logrotate
npm install pm2-daily-rotate
npm install pm2-autorestart
npm install pm2-auto-restart

cd ../client
npm init -y
npm install react
npm install react-dom
npm install react-router-dom
npm install axios
npm install react-toastify
npm install react-icons
npm install react-spinners
npm install react-slick
npm install react-image-lightbox
npm install react-lazy-load-image-component
npm install react-slick
npm install react-slick-carousel
npm install react-slick-carousel
npm install react-slick-carousel
npm install react-slick-carousel
npm install react-slick-carousel
npm install react-slick-carousel
npm install react-slick-carousel

npm install axios

npm install react-slick-carousel
npm install react-slick-carousel
npm install react-slick-carousel

npm install
npm run dev --prefix client & npm run start --prefix server & pm2 start ecosystem.config.js

git init
git add .
